title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that my account is more secure.
attributes_and_rules: Includes password protection, one-time passcodes, and biometric authentication.
acceptance_criteria: The system should enforce multi-factor authentication during the login process.
test_cases: Given a user tries to login, when they input their credentials, then they should be prompted for multi-factor authentication.

title: Implement Secure Session Management
description: As a customer, I want my session to be securely managed, so that my data remains protected.
attributes_and_rules: Includes session management and device recognition.
acceptance_criteria: The system should manage sessions securely and recognize user devices.
test_cases: Given a user logs in, when they navigate the system, then their session should remain secure and their device should be recognized.

title: Integrate Advanced Encryption
description: As a customer, I want my credentials and data to be encrypted, so that they are safe from unauthorized access.
attributes_and_rules: Includes advanced encryption of credentials and data.
acceptance_criteria: All credentials and data should be encrypted both in transit and at rest.
test_cases: Given a user submits their credentials, when data is transmitted, then it should be encrypted at all points.

title: Develop Responsive UI
description: As a customer, I want a responsive user interface, so that I can access the portal on any device.
attributes_and_rules: The interface must be accessible on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
acceptance_criteria: The user interface should be fully responsive and adaptable to different devices.
test_cases: Given a user visits the portal, when they use different devices, then the interface should adapt and display properly.

title: Build Personalized Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see my accounts and relevant services at a glance.
attributes_and_rules: Displays accounts, eligible products, and services.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should show personalized information for the user.
test_cases: Given a user logs into their account, when they view their dashboard, then it should display their accounts and relevant products.

title: Optimize for Performance and Accessibility
description: As a customer, I want the interface to be optimized for performance and accessibility, so that I can navigate seamlessly.
acceptance_criteria: The interface should load quickly and be easy to navigate for all users.
test_cases: Given a user accesses the portal, when they navigate the interface, then it should load quickly and be accessible.

epic_title: Core Banking System Integration and Local Database Management
title: Integrate Self-Service Portal with Core Banking System
description: As a customer, I want the self-service portal to be integrated with the core banking system, so that I can manage my finances seamlessly.
attributes_and_rules: Integration via an API or middleware solution.
acceptance_criteria: The self-service portal should integrate with the core banking system.
test_cases: Given a user interacts with the portal, when they perform banking operations, then the system should communicate with the core banking system.

epic_title: Core Banking System Integration and Local Database Management
title: Manage Local Data Storage Efficiently
description: As a customer, I want local data storage to be managed efficiently, so that my data is accessible and secure.
attributes_and_rules: Includes redundancy, synchronization protocols, and transaction integrity.
acceptance_criteria: The local data storage should be optimized for performance and security.
test_cases: Given a user accesses their data, when the system retrieves information, then it should be efficient and secure.

epic_title: Core Banking System Integration and Local Database Management
title: Ensure System Resilience and Fault Tolerance
description: As a customer, I want system resilience and fault tolerance, so that services are continuously available.
attributes_and_rules: Ensure system resilience, fault tolerance, and high performance during peak traffic.
acceptance_criteria: The system should be resilient and fault tolerant during peak traffic.
test_cases: Given a high traffic period, when customers access services, then the system should remain available and perform normally.

epic_title: Workflow Automation for Account Opening and Service Requests
title: Develop Guided Workflows for Account Openings
description: As a customer, I want guided workflows for opening new accounts, so that the process is easy and efficient.
attributes_and_rules: Include data pre-filling, validation rules, and real-time eligibility checks.
acceptance_criteria: The workflow for opening new accounts should be guided and user-friendly.
test_cases: Given a user starts a new account application, when they follow the guided steps, then the process should be seamless and efficient.

epic_title: Workflow Automation for Account Opening and Service Requests
title: Enable Real-Time Status Updates for Service Requests
description: As a customer, I want real-time status updates for my service requests, so that I am informed of the progress.
attributes_and_rules: Include auto-save functionality for incomplete applications.
acceptance_criteria: The system should provide real-time status updates for service requests.
test_cases: Given a user submits a service request, when they check the status, then they should see real-time updates.

epic_title: Workflow Automation for Account Opening and Service Requests
title: Integrate Workflows with Backend Services
description: As a customer, I want the workflows to be integrated with backend services, so that my requests are processed automatically.
attributes_and_rules: Include backend banking services for automated processing and status updates.
acceptance_criteria: The workflows should be integrated with backend services for automated processing.
test_cases: Given a user submits a request, when it is processed, then the backend services should handle it automatically.
